dialogues.text: Finally! Hurry up, we need to get out of here!
What's wrong? ... You don't remember anything?
It seems something went wrong with the integration of the matrix, and your neural pathways are in chaos...
I am the 'Transcendent eXtended Environment Management Assitant', or TXEMA, for short.
You just stole an experimental piece of equipement from the evil G.A.T.E corp.
In the process of integrating the artifact, something went wrong... For now, our priority is escaping.
Surely, you remember how to move, right?
(Use the directional keys 'A' and 'D' to move, and use 'Space' to jump)
